characterInfo.Title(s): The Lopen,  Bridge Four Assistant Quartermaster
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Dawnshard,  Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Lopen is a Herdazian bridgeman in Bridge Four. Unable to carry bridges, he makes himself useful to his bridge crew by carrying waterskins for them on bridge runs and aiding in the surgery and post-battle first-aid delivered by Kaladin.[citation needed] He apparently has many cousins that can be called on to do favors.
